Om Prakash Singh
Linux Engineer - Python developer - Automation Expert - Devops Evnagelist

About

I studied Bachelor in Hotel Management working in Hotel Industry for a couple of years I moved myself to IT. I was working with Linux from 1999 and have exlored many aspects of Linux since then. My inital works mainly involved system adminstration and system configuration. During my initial years I customized systems as mail severs, proxy servers, DNS servers and web servers. In coming years, i got interested towards programming, blogging and contributed to opensource projects.

I love reading books and enjoy spending time with my kids.

I am planning to write about a lot of things which will include completion of my 30 days emacs challenge, reviews for the books, movies and anything which worth needs mention. I mostly blog about the techinal things like using Emacs and automation.

Location

Central Mumbai
Thane, MH
